official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of an independent commission to set appropriate levels of compensation for members of Congress.

summary.text: Congressional Compensation Responsibility Act - Establishes the Congressional Compensation Commission to fix the annual rate of pay for Members of Congress and the Vice President. Amends the Federal Salary Act of 1967 and the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 to conform to such provision.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of an independent commission to set appropriate levels of compensation for members of Congress.
